Trans - 2 , 3 - Epoxysuccinic acid ( 2 . 95 eq ) and N , N ' - dicyclohexylcarbodiimide ( 2 . 95 eq ) was added and the suspension stirred overnight . The solvent was removed in vacuo , the residue was taken up in ethanol and aqueous sodium hydroxide solution ( 2 mol / l , 2 eq ) was added dropwise .
